component.name: SaveTask
component.script:
sub init() print "Init SaveTask" m.top.functionName = "store" m.top.data = {} end sub
sub test() print "Data changed:" ? m.top.data end sub
sub store() print "Store" sec = CreateObject("roRegistrySection", "settings") if m.top.task = "save": for each item in m.top.data: print "key: " + item print "val: " + m.top.data[item] sec.Write(item, m.top.data[item]) end for sec.flush() print "Save done" else if m.top.task = "load": data = {} for each key in sec.GetKeyList(): print "read key: " key if sec.Exists(key) data[key] = sec.Read(key) print "read val: " data[key] else print "Key does not exist" end if end for m.top.data = data print "Load done" ? data else print "Unknown task: " + task end if end sub
